post.body: you will receive advise that will help you in your goals to advance your music career. www.myspace.com/kimthomasramos
Just finishing in the studio for the night. Dog stopped barking. LOL. I am almost done. Whew! Look out for Fire early next month.
Getting ready to go into the studio tonight, and my dog won't stop barking. Ugh!
Getting ready to receive tour dates. I am really excited. See you on the road!!! Also be on the look out for "Fire". www.yahaloma.com
Over 11 million views and counting. Stop by and take a listen. www.myspace.com/kimthomasramos
I just hate it when the tape gets stuck in the vcr!!! And I hate it when the dvd player just starts to act up all of a sudden!!! UGH!!
Gettting situated, and ready to finish up my this project.
The date is Dec 31st. Sorry!
Will be on www.hotwordzlyricaltheater.com Dec. 30th for their reunion broadcast. Don't miss it!
I am so happy to inform you that I will be touring this year locally, and nationally. Keep in touch. www.myspace.com/kimthomasramos
Thinking about the cute new donated girl book bags. Blessings to the sender. www.myspace.com/zionkarate
Looking at the new donated paint job at Zion Karate. Thanks so much for your help and support. Donate at www.myspace.com/zionkarate
Just sitting here thinking that I really need an assistant. Ugh!!! So much to do.
Eartha Kitt just passed. I knew her, she took me shopping when I young in London. Please be prayerful, she has a daughter.
We received 3 book bags today for the children at zion karate. Thanks. Please help us help the children. www.myspace.com/zionkarate
I am asking all who can help to help a school in Miami, Fl. The children need food, $, shoes, etc.. www.myspace.com/zionkarate Thanks!!!
My grandmother, who is 102 years old, is now dying. Please keep us in your prayers. Blessings, Yahaloma about 8 hours ago
My grandmother, who is 102 years old, is now dying. Please keep us in your prayers. Blessings, Yahaloma
I am at the Karate school right now. These children are in need of shoes, money, food, school supplies, etc. contact me if u want to donate.
I am on my way to Port St. Lucie Fl for a show. For more details go to www.myspace.com/kimthomasramos. Hope to see you there!
